member.summary: This user control display UIs for displaying the objective of a COP problem. The objective is projected on a 2-D coordinate plane and therefore, turns out to be a surface on 3D space.

member.name: T:COP.COPBenchmark
member.summary: This class defines required information for a continuous real number optimization problem. Only single objective problem is considered and multiple optimum solutions are allowed. Restricted within a finite bound on each dimension, the problem does not have external constraints. This class is associated with a problem definition file with extension name "cop" and a rich text formatted description file. Both of them share the same root file name. The rtf description file is optional and the cop file is a UniCoded well formatted file. At least the souce code writtern in either C# or VS of the objective function shoul be provided. The gradient vector computation function is optional. The best objective value and optimal solutions may remain unknown.

member.name: M:COP.COPBenchmark.ValidateSouceCode(COP.ProgrammingLanguage,System.String[],System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Global utility function to check whether the user supplied souce code can be successfully compiled. 透過實際模擬編譯，查驗某cop問題定義的程式碼，是否有語法錯誤。
member.param: Customer code embedded in the constructor
Customer code for gradient vector computation

member.returns: A valid optimization problem or null
